channel.title: 2025 Emmys on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in 2025 Emmys on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Emmys Red Carpet Power Rankings: Lisa Manobal and Pedro Pascal Top the Style Conversation
item.description: Selena Gomez, Chase Sui Wonders and Jenna Ortega also generated millions in earned engagement on Sunday’s red carpet. Plus: The designer of Manobal’s dress talks details.

item.title: Emmys Red Carpet Power Rankings: Lisa Manobal and Pedro Pascal Top the Style Conversation
item.description: Selena Gomez, Chase Sui Wonders and Jenna Ortega also generated millions in earned engagement on Sunday’s red carpet. Plus: The designer of Manobal’s dress talks details.

item.title: 2025 Emmy Awards Analysis: How ‘The Pitt’ Beat ‘Severance,’ and ‘The Studio’ and ‘Adolescence’ Dominated
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter’s executive editor of awards coverage dissects Sunday’s ceremony.

item.title: 2025 Emmy Awards Analysis: How ‘The Pitt’ Beat ‘Severance,’ and ‘The Studio’ and ‘Adolescence’ Dominated
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter’s executive editor of awards coverage dissects Sunday’s ceremony.

item.title: Emmy Awards Analysis: How ‘The Pitt’ Beat ‘Severance,’ and ‘The Studio’ and ‘Adolescence’ Dominated
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter’s executive editor of awards coverage dissects Sunday’s ceremony.

item.title: Sofía Vergara Misses Emmys Due to Eye Allergy
item.description: The ‘Griselda’ star was set to present the award for best actor in a limited or anthology series or movie, which went to Stephen Graham for ‘Adolescence.’

item.title: Sofía Vergara Misses Emmys Due to Eye Allergy
item.description: The ‘Griselda’ star was set to present the award for best actor in a limited or anthology series or movie, which went to Stephen Graham for ‘Adolescence.’

item.title: Selena Gomez, Michelle Williams and Tramell Tillman Among the Standout Looks at 2025 Emmys
item.description: Gomez was among several women who opted for power red, while Williams chose vintage Chanel, and Tillman looked crisp in custom Dolce & Gabbana.

item.title: Selena Gomez, Michelle Williams and Tramell Tillman Among the Standout Looks at 2025 Emmys
item.description: Gomez was among several women who opted for power red, while Williams chose vintage Chanel, and Tillman looked crisp in custom Dolce & Gabbana.

item.title: Katherine LaNasa Thanks Nurses That Inspired ‘The Pitt’ Character in First Emmy Win
item.description: The veteran actress won the award for best supporting actress, beating out a number of contenders from ‘The White Lotus,’ Julianne Nicholson (‘Paradise’) and Patricia Arquette (‘Severance’).

item.title: Katherine LaNasa Thanks Nurses That Inspired ‘The Pitt’ Character in First Emmy Win
item.description: The veteran actress won the award for best supporting actress, beating out a number of contenders from ‘The White Lotus,’ Julianne Nicholson (‘Paradise’) and Patricia Arquette (‘Severance’).

item.title: Emmys: Ted Danson and Mary Streenburgen Tapped for Bob Hope Humanitarian Award
item.description: Danson and Steenburgen, who have been married since 1995, are the first couple to receive the honor, which has been presented irregularly since 2002.

item.title: Emmys: Ted Danson and Mary Streenburgen Tapped for Bob Hope Humanitarian Award
item.description: Danson and Steenburgen, who have been married since 1995, are the first couple to receive the honor, which has been presented irregularly since 2002.

item.title: ‘The White Lotus’ Checks Into the 2025 Emmy Noms With 23, Ties With ‘The Studio’
item.description: However, the Mike White-born series left a few key castmembers like Patrick Schwarzenegger, Michelle Monaghan, Sam Nivola and Leslie Bibb without nominations.

item.title: ‘The White Lotus’ Checks Into the 2025 Emmy Noms With 23, Ties With ‘The Studio’
item.description: However, the Mike White-born series left a few key castmembers like Patrick Schwarzenegger, Michelle Monaghan, Sam Nivola and Leslie Bibb without nominations.
